Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client of the media production company, storing their contact details, communication logs, and project history.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Client entity.

name.description: The full name of the client or company.

contactPerson.description: The primary contact person at the client's organization.

email.description: The primary email address for client communications.

phone.description: The primary phone number for client communications.

address.description: The billing or physical address of the client.

notes.description: General notes or remarks about the client.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the client record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the client record was last updated.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Defines roles within the application for access control, outlining what actions a team member can perform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Role entity.

name.description: The name of the role (e.g., 'Admin', 'Project Manager', 'Team Member').

description.description: A brief description of the role and its typical responsibilities.

permissions.description: A list of permission strings associated with this role (e.g., 'can_view_projects', 'can_edit_tasks').

createdAt.description: The date and time when the role was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the role was last updated.

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents a user or employee of the media production company, including their contact details, role, and hourly rate for billing purposes.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Team Member entity. (Note: Authentication data is managed externally).

firstName.description: The first name of the team member.

lastName.description: The last name of the team member.

email.description: The professional email address of the team member.

roleId.description: Reference to the Role assigned to this team member. (Relationship: Role 1:N TeamMember)

hourlyRate.description: The hourly billing rate for this team member, used for invoice generation if applicable.

profilePictureUrl.description: A URL to the team member's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the team member record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the team member record was last updated.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a media production project, tracking its details, status, deadlines, budget, and associated tasks and team members.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

clientId.description: Reference to the Client associated with this project. (Relationship: Client 1:N Project)

description.description: A detailed description of the project's scope and objectives.

status.description: The current status of the project (e.g., 'Planning', 'In Progress', 'Completed', 'On Hold').

startDate.description: The planned start date of the project.

dueDate.description: The planned due date or deadline for the project.

budget.description: The allocated budget for the project.

taskIds.description: References to tasks belonging to this project. (Relationship: Project 1:N Task)

teamMemberIds.description: References to team members assigned to work on this project. (Relationship: Project N:N TeamMember)

createdAt.description: The date and time when the project record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the project record was last updated.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents an individual task within a project, including its status, assignment, and deadlines.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

projectId.description: Reference to the Project this task belongs to. (Relationship: Project 1:N Task)

name.description: The name or title of the task.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

status.description: The current status of the task (e.g., 'To Do', 'In Progress', 'Done', 'Blocked').

assignedTeamMemberId.description: Reference to the Team Member assigned to this task. (Relationship: TeamMember 1:N Task)

dueDate.description: The planned due date for the task.

priority.description: The priority level of the task (e.g., 'Low', 'Medium', 'High').

createdAt.description: The date and time when the task record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the task record was last updated.

TimeEntry.title: TimeEntry
TimeEntry.description: Records the time spent by a team member on a specific task or project, used for automated time tracking and billing.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Time Entry entity.

teamMemberId.description: Reference to the Team Member who recorded this time entry. (Relationship: TeamMember 1:N TimeEntry)

projectId.description: Reference to the Project this time entry is associated with. (Relationship: Project 1:N TimeEntry)

taskId.description: Reference to the specific Task this time entry is for. (Relationship: Task 1:N TimeEntry)

description.description: A description of the work performed during this time entry.

startTime.description: The start date and time of the work.

endTime.description: The end date and time of the work.

durationMinutes.description: The duration of the work in minutes.

isBillable.description: Indicates whether this time entry is billable to the client.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the time entry record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the time entry record was last updated.

InvoiceLineItem.title: InvoiceLineItem
InvoiceLineItem.description: Represents a single item or service listed on an invoice, including its description, quantity, and price, often derived from time entries or fixed services.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Invoice Line Item entity.

invoiceId.description: Reference to the Invoice this line item belongs to. (Relationship: Invoice 1:N InvoiceLineItem)

description.description: A description of the service or item being billed (e.g., 'Consulting Services', 'Time for Task X').

quantity.description: The quantity of the item or hours for the service.

unitPrice.description: The price per unit or per hour for the item/service.

total.description: The total amount for this line item (quantity * unitPrice).

timeEntryIds.description: References to Time Entries that collectively form this invoice line item, if applicable. (Relationship: TimeEntry N:N InvoiceLineItem)

createdAt.description: The date and time when the invoice line item record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the invoice line item record was last updated.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents a professional invoice generated and sent to a client, detailing services, amounts, and payment status.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Invoice entity.

clientId.description: Reference to the Client to whom this invoice is issued. (Relationship: Client 1:N Invoice)

issueDate.description: The date when the invoice was issued.

dueDate.description: The date by which the payment is expected.

paymentDate.description: The date when the payment was received, if applicable.

status.description: The current payment status of the invoice (e.g., 'Draft', 'Sent', 'Paid', 'Overdue', 'Cancelled').

subtotalAmount.description: The sum of all line item totals before tax.

taxAmount.description: The total amount of tax applied to the invoice.

totalAmount.description: The grand total amount of the invoice, including tax.

currency.description: The currency code of the invoice amount (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR').

notes.description: Any additional notes or terms for the invoice.

invoiceLineItemIds.description: References to the line items included in this invoice. (Relationship: Invoice 1:N InvoiceLineItem)

createdAt.description: The date and time when the invoice record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the invoice record was last updated.

Opportunity.title: Opportunity
Opportunity.description: Represents a potential sales lead or business opportunity, used for tracking the sales pipeline and forecasting.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Opportunity entity.

clientId.description: Optional reference to an existing Client associated with this opportunity. (Relationship: Client 1:N Opportunity)

name.description: A descriptive name for the opportunity (e.g., 'New Website for Acme Corp').

description.description: Detailed description of the potential project or service.

status.description: The current stage of the opportunity in the sales pipeline (e.g., 'Prospecting', 'Proposal Sent', 'Won', 'Lost').

estimatedValue.description: The estimated monetary value of the opportunity.

expectedCloseDate.description: The anticipated date by which the opportunity is expected to close.

assignedTeamMemberId.description: Reference to the Team Member responsible for this opportunity (e.g., a sales person). (Relationship: TeamMember 1:N Opportunity)

notes.description: Internal notes related to the sales opportunity.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the opportunity record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the opportunity record was last updated.

CompanyBillingSettings.title: CompanyBillingSettings
CompanyBillingSettings.description: Stores global billing and invoicing settings for the media production company, such as default payment terms, tax rates, and banking details. This entity is expected to have only one record.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Company Billing Settings entity.

companyName.description: The legal name of the company as it should appear on invoices.

companyAddress.description: The full physical address of the company for billing correspondence.

companyEmail.description: The official email address for billing inquiries.

companyPhone.description: The official phone number for billing inquiries.

taxId.description: The company's tax identification number (e.g., VAT ID, EIN) for legal and tax purposes.

cinNumber.description: Corporate Identity Number for legal registration.

panNumber.description: Permanent Account Number for tax compliance.

logo.description: Base64 encoded string or URL of the organization brand logo.

bankName.description: The name of the bank where payments should be transferred.

bankAccountNumber.description: The bank account number for receiving payments.

bankSwiftCode.description: The SWIFT/IFSC code for bank transfers.

createdAt.description: The date and time when these billing settings were first created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when these billing settings were last updated.

SidebarItem.title: SidebarItem
SidebarItem.description: Represents an item in the workspace sidebar, including its visibility and display order.

ProjectSettings.title: ProjectSettings
ProjectSettings.description: Global settings for projects, such as available execution verticals.

definition.description: Top-level collection for all client records.
Collection for defining available roles and their permissions.
Collection for all team members matching their Firebase Authentication UID.
Top-level collection for all production projects.
Subcollection of Project for individual tasks.
Global singleton document for organization settings.
Collection of sidebar items for dynamic navigation management.
Singleton document for global project configuration.
